name: Gone Fishing (ChacoDev, AarslandM)
description:
A game made in a few days by Sean Sinclair and Martin Malmei Aarsland to learn Godot. 

How many fish can you catch? Might even get a little "explosive" ;) 

How to play: 

Press the fish then click when the outer circle is inside the inner circle to catch it! Right click to make your hook go boom :)
